ValidationRule.description: If the Reassign-Category 1 = Employer Contribution and Reassign-Category 2 = Employer Match and Reassign-Category 3 = Per Pay Match True-Up, then the Reassign-Category 4 needs to be entered before the case can be saved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Name = 'Service Support 401k/S125 Case',
ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_1__c,'Employer Contribution'), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_2__c,'Employer Match'), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_3__c,'Per Pay Match True-Up'), ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_4__c,''))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reassign-Category 4 needs to be entered to route the project correctly.
